pageProduct.name: Pain Away Forte + Arthritis Relief Spray
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

For Relief and Recovery of Joints & Muscles. Pain Away's active ingredients are traditionally used in western herbal medicine for the relief of - Symptoms of mild arthritis, bruising, mild joint pain and inflammation, muscle pain and inflammation, muscle sprains, strains & soreness.

Warnings

Contains Ethanol. External use only: Avoid contact with eyes, open wounds and mucous membranes. If you have sensitive skin, test this product on a small area of skin before applying it to a large area. If irritation occurs, discontinue use.

Ingredients

Arnica Montana Flower Tincture, Rosemary Oil, Boswellia Carterii Extract, Eucalyptus Oil. Also contains Lavender Oil, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E.

Directions

Directions for use - Shake well before use. Most effective when liberally applied, Eg. 4-6 pumps of the spray on affected and most importantly surrounding areas. Lightly rub in and reapply after 30 seconds. For optimum results, repeat 4-5 times daily for 3 to 5 days. When you feel acute pain has subsided, use Pain Away Arthritis Pain Relief Spray at least once each morning & evening for continued temporary relief. If symptoms persist talk to your health professional.
